channel.title: Alt. US-395 on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Alt. US-395 on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 16
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 16 - Old US 395. Use Exit 16 for Alt. US-395.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 10
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 10 - Eastlake Blvd. This is the southern terminus of Alt. US-395. Alt. US-395 was created when the new I-580 freeway was completed. Alt. US-395 follows the old route of US-395 to Reno.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 50
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 50 - Old US 395. Use Exit 50 for Alt. US-395.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 50
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 50 - Old US 395. Use Exit 50 for Alt. US-395.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 44
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 44 - Alt. US-395 North/Eastlake Blvd. Alt. US-395 north was created when the new I-580 freeway was completed. Alt. US-395 follows the old route of US-395 to Reno.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 44
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 44 - Alt. US-395 North/Eastlake Blvd.
